panels.description:
Anzeige von Prozessen und deren Threads
(inkl. Auslastung)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "hsebucket_fileres")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "fwrite" or r["functionname"] == "writev" or r["functionname"] == "write")
  |> group(columns: ["thread", "processid"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: inf, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "hsebucket_fileres")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "fwrite" or r["functionname"] == "writev" or r["functionname"] == "write")
  |> group(columns: ["thread", "processid"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: inf, column:"_value", fn:distinct, createEmpty: false)
  |>yield(name: "distinct")

panels.title: ThreadMap Panel

targets.query:
from(bucket: "hsebucket_fileres")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
        |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "fwrite" or r["functionname"] == "writev" or r["functionname"] == "write")
          |> group(columns: ["thread"])
            |> aggregateWindow(every: inf, column:"_value", fn:distinct, createEmpty: false)
              |>yield(name: "distinct")

from(bucket: "hsebucket_fileres")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "fwrite" or r["functionname"] == "writev" or r["functionname"] == "write")
|> group(columns: ["thread", "processid"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: inf, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
|> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "hsebucket_fileres")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "fwrite" or r["functionname"] == "writev" or r["functionname"] == "write")
|> group(columns: ["thread", "processid"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: inf, column:"_value", fn:distinct, createEmpty: false)
|>yield(name: "distinct")
